title: [Large-Scale] Fundamentals of Terahertz Detector Design: Understanding Meta-Array Coupling Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational electromagnetism and semiconductor device comprehension
context.additional_context: Delivered to beginners by breaking down complex THz theory into step-by-step modules, designed for effective knowledge transfer in asynchronous learning environments

learning_goals: Explain the fundamental principles of terahertz detectors and the application methods of metamaterial-based coupling technologies
Quantitatively compare performance enhancements of metamaterial array designs utilizing Fano resonance against conventional antennas
Understand the concept of a deep learning-based design framework (KAN) and implement its application to metamaterial optimization using simulation tools
Complete the design process of a terahertz detector optimized for specific frequency bands through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
